## ViewWindows class

Same as [react-native's View](https://facebook.github.io/react-native/docs/view)<!-- -->, but with extra windows specific functionality

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ViewWindows extends React.Component<IViewWindowsProps> 
```
